text: Boole, “khusuubiile Nyasaye nende kalia akeshibwa khwifwe nende khu Ibraheem, nende Isameil, nende Is’haq nende Yaqoob, nende Abaana ba Yaqoob, nende keshibwa khu Musa nende Yesu nende akeshibwa khu Abarumwa okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu, shikhwitsa okhukabukhasia yesi yesi hakari wabu tawe nafu khuli abehotselesi khuye
